greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 5: repeat [1,0,1,0,0].
comment: Unsigned version of A105385; also partial sums of A156174.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = ((n+1) mod 5) mod 2. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Feb 18 2015
a(n) = (2/5) * (1 + cos(2*(n-2)*Pi/5) + cos(4*(n-2)*Pi/5) + cos(2*n*Pi/5) + cos(4*n*Pi/5)). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Sep 26 2018
a(n) = floor(((2*n-1) mod 5)/3). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 29 2020
program: (MAGMA) [((n+1) mod 5) mod 2: n in [0..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Feb 18 2015
(PARI) a(n)=n%5==0 || n%5==2 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 28 2011
xref: Cf. A079998. See A232990 for another version.
Cf. A057354 (partial sums, without initial zeros).
results.author: _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 27 2011
